snippet.title: Bum Bum Monsterz - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now! Try our free demo on Steam Next Fest!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2071400/Bum_Bum_Monsterz/

Bum Bum Monsterz is a 2v2 to 4v4 team-based multiplayer party game! Gather friends for hilarious challenges, tackle obstacles, and solve puzzles. Engage in absurd 20+ minigames, online or locally, with vibrant graphics and silly characters. Get ready for a wild ride and JIGGLY butt-filled madness!
